Module mesakit.map.ui.desktop
Package com.telenav.mesakit.map.ui.desktop.tiles

Class SlippyTileCoordinateSystem

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.ui.desktop.graphics.drawing.geometry.DrawingCoordinateSystem
com.telenav.mesakit.map.ui.desktop.tiles.SlippyTileCoordinateSystem
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.Named, com.telenav.kivakit.ui.desktop.graphics.drawing.Coordinated, com.telenav.kivakit.ui.desktop.graphics.drawing.CoordinateSystem
public class SlippyTileCoordinateSystem extends com.telenav.kivakit.ui.desktop.graphics.drawing.geometry.DrawingCoordinateSystem
A tile coordinate system with an origin at 0, 0 and an extent based on the ZoomLevel and tile size. The coordinate system supports mapping between Locations and DrawingPoints using a SphericalMercatorMapProjection.
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
